channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Genki Pre-Publish Reminder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Genki Pre-Publish Reminder

item.title: CVE-2022-1758|2024-08-03T00:16:59.867Z -- unknown -- genki%20pre-publish%20reminder
item.description: The Genki Pre-Publish Reminder WordPress plugin through 1.4.1 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack and lead to Stored XSS as well as RCE when custom code is added via the plugin settings.
